description: LGBTQs go a long way in Asian history, but it is often not discussed in mainstream education due to its inaccessibility. Now is your chance to get to know more about ancient Asian texts that mention gay relationships, a third gender, and more! You'll also touch on contemporary activist movements that fight for the rights of gays and queers in Asian countries. Take part in a discussion to further understand Asian society, and use your newfound understanding to enlighten others about LGBTs in Asia!
title: LGBTQs in Asia: An Introduction
